resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Store surveillance images on the cloud
Store surveillance images in device storage
Number of detected motion before the alert is triggered
Play an alert sound when alert is triggered
Microphone to use for recording audio
Start the surveillance camera as background service
Check this to auto start control panel service upon reboot
Check this to disable ongoing notification
When this is checked, user is required to login to control panel
Check this to start control panel
Send notification to this Gmail address
Send notification to this phone number
Check this to enable device tracking (authorized access required for Google services)
Set a unique name for this device
Check this to display a web browser on top of camera
Check this to enable face detection
How many days of image files to keep in Google Drive
Configured Google email accounts in your device
Location of local image and video files
When this is checked, user is required to enter lock pattern during app start-up
Configure lock pattern used during app start-up and surveillance camera locking
Define the aging days for old messages
Define the number of messages to keep
Choose the method to housekeep the internal message store
Outline thickness for the detected motion object
Record video when motion is detected
Check this to enable motion detection
Send notification through Google Cloud Messaging (GCM)
Password to allow remote startup/shutdown of app
Allow app to be started by SMS (send "mymobkit yourpassword <start/stop>" to the device)
Save sent messages in sent box
Check this to view detected motion in camera view
Show instant notification from all connected devices
Close application when device is touched
Configure storage settings for captured photos
Check this so that detected motion is streamed
Configure camera settings in surveillance mode
Set the approximate bitrate of videos (higher means better quality, but takes up more disk space)
Set the duration (in minutes) for continuous recorded video sessions
Set the video frames per second (fps).
Set the minimum storage in megabyte (mb). When storage is below this threshold, older video files are removed
Enable video stabilization reduces the shaking due to the motion of the camera in both the preview and in recorded videos
Port used to serve the web page, video and audio

myMobKit is already the default SMS app

1. When control panel is started, please grant all the required permissions in order for myMobKit to function properly.

2. For messaging APIs to receive SMS/MMS, you need to configure this app as the default SMS app through the option menu.
